pageDesc: Discover our new Monster Flake holds, designed to feel right from the first touch.

props.imageDesc: Climber on wall with Monster Flake holds

paragraphs.name: intro
paragraphs.desc: The Monster Flake holds are designed to feel right from the first touch. Juggy shapes adapted for overhanging walls,both lead and boulder. From small footholds to positive crimps and big jugs, Monster Flake delivers a full range of simple and intuitive shapes.

paragraphs.name: p1
paragraphs.desc: With 84 PU holds dispatched in 19 sets, the new Monster Flake range offers a wide range of setting possibilities. The dual-textured finish enhances the juggy grips: the holds remain positive and confidence-inspiring, while the smooth areas stay demanding. The wavy surfaces reinforce comfort, fully supporting the natural juggy character of the shapes.

mainImage.alt: Climber on wall with Monster Flake holds

paragraphs.name: jug
paragraphs.desc: Monster Flake holds have character and a unique identity, while ensuring comfort and ease of use in route setting, particularly for commercial settings. The Monster Flake range focuses on the quality of the climb. The holds support commitment and confidence on the wall, helping create routes and boulders that feel balanced and natural to climb.

paragraphs.name: inspo
paragraphs.desc: Inspired by natural flakes, these holds offer the familiarity of outdoor rock, but don't worry, these ones are never loose!
